Sentencas: In this study, Sr2Ni1.8Mo0.2O6-delta (SNM) with a double perovskite structure was investigated as an alternative anode for use in the CH4 fuel in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Characteristics of Sr2Ni1.8Mo0.2O6-δ Anode for Utilization in Methane Fuel Conditions in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: SNM demonstrates a double perovskite phase over 600 degrees C and marginal crystallization at higher temperatures.
Titulo: Characteristics of Sr2Ni1.8Mo0.2O6-δ Anode for Utilization in Methane Fuel Conditions in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The Ni nanoparticles were exsolved from the SNM anode during the fabrication process.
Titulo: Characteristics of Sr2Ni1.8Mo0.2O6-δ Anode for Utilization in Methane Fuel Conditions in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: As the SNM anode demonstrates poor electrochemical and electro-catalytic properties in the H-2 and CH4 fuels, it was modified by applying a samarium-doped ceria (SDC) coating on its surface to improve the cell performance.
Titulo: Characteristics of Sr2Ni1.8Mo0.2O6-δ Anode for Utilization in Methane Fuel Conditions in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: As a result of this SDC modification, the cell performance improved from 39.4 mW/cm(2) to 117.7 mW/cm(2) in H-2 and from 15.9 mW/cm(2) to 66.6 mW/cm(2) in CH4 at 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Characteristics of Sr2Ni1.8Mo0.2O6-δ Anode for Utilization in Methane Fuel Conditions in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The mixed ionic and electronic conductive property of the SDC provided electrochemical oxidation sites that are beyond the triple boundary phase sites in the SNM anode.
Titulo: Characteristics of Sr2Ni1.8Mo0.2O6-δ Anode for Utilization in Methane Fuel Conditions in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In addition, the carbon deposition on the SDC thin layer was minimized due to the SDC's excellent oxygen ion conductivity.
Titulo: Characteristics of Sr2Ni1.8Mo0.2O6-δ Anode for Utilization in Methane Fuel Conditions in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
